entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Call to "File.AppendAllText()" function may not always work and may sometimes corrupt the file. #70247
  • Suboptimal code generated for ref fields only used within local scope #70242
  • Add explicit documentation about C/C++ feature usage rule #70239
    Future
  • inject services for properties marked with the new C# 11 required keyword #70235
  • Assert failure: m_alignpad == 0 in System.IO.Pipes.Tests #70231

Closed

  • ObservableCollection Bug #69008
  • Non-null indirection should consider COMMA (CNS_INT) nodes #57515
    7.0.0
  • How to extract cookies from HttpClient? #70155
  • Sse41.IsSupported check blocks optimization after inlining #55342
    7.0.0
  • Vector128.IsHardwareAccelerated always returns false in debugger #69576
  • Singlefile+composite test is failing in SDK repo #60308
  • Perf regressions in Perf_Matrix benchmarks #59415
    7.0.0
  • [Perf] Changes at 1/21/2022 9:08:44 PM #64273
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Handle mis-sized structs in ARM/64 `PUTARG_SPLIT` codegen #70249
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • PipeReaderStream.ReadInternal throws AggregateException unexpectedly #70248
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • Fix regex outerloop tests #70246
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • fix: [Wasm] Restore _free default export for Emcc 3.1.7 or later #70245
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Delete ENABLE_REFLECTION_TRACE #70244
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Refactor how implicit byrefs are morphed #70243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fold System.Private.Reflection.Metadata into Corelib #70241
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • WIP: Add private {ReadOnly}Span ctor that takes a ref, index and length #70240
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Investigate helix error return #70238
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #70236
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][wasm] Revert the gc_pin optimization changes. #70234
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add support for symbol stripping #70233
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: broaden cloning invariant checks #70232
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Re-enable the pause intrinsic test for x86/x64 CoreCLR #70230

Merged

  • Move Environment.iOS.cs under libraries #70226
  • Safe size estimation for SymbolicRegexNode #70139
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Consolidate morphing of local nodes #69819
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Re-enable `Runtime_56953` on ARM64 #70237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Fix test skipping for mobile device runtime tests #70023
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Utilize VN-based non-null knowledge better #69808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete a little more dead rationalizer code #70218
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: add missing cloning test case and fix jit dump #70225
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Handle mis-sized structs in XARCH `PUTARG_STK` codegen #68611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Delete `GT_INDEX` #69917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Enable folding of struct indirs used by returns in local morph #69947
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not use `LEA`s in HIR #69992
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Delete a few dependencies on field sequences #69991
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold more `OBJ(ADDR(LCL))` patterns in multi-reg morphing #70207
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete obsolete code from `gtSetMultiOpOrder` #70216
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Do not rely on `GT_ADDR` in `gtFoldBoxNullable` #69961
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use ClrSafeInt everywhere and cleanup other same math declarations #70197
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Test additional NativeAOT Lib testing #70212
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Hoist `GT_COMMA`s in CSE #70228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bug fixes from dead code elimination #69897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test early md array lowering #70193
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove complex marshalling support from crossgen2 #70183
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix race condition in WASM crypto worker #70185
    area-System.Security
  • [mono] Extend mono AOT compiler to ingest .mibc profiles #70194
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] Add infrastructure for building WebWorkers #70220
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Enabling console logger queue length and mode to be configurable #70186
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [wasm][debugger] Support new hot reload features #70097
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, area-EnC-mono
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • maui-check fails : Unrecognized workload ID android-aot #25848
  • dotnet workload update --print-download-link-only --sdk-version 6.0.400-preview.22301.10 #25773

Updated

  • installed global tool is missing #25767
  • No Ijwhost.dll when referencing C++/CLR NuGet package from .NET 6 C# app #24310
    Backlog
  • exclude markdown changes from triggering a build in pipeline #25664
  • dotnet run looks in the wrong bin/obj directories if targetting only one non-AnyCPU platform in <Platforms>, but works with <Platform> added #25514
  • dotnet workload list --machine-readable with 6.0.400 preview do not list installed workloads from previous sdk band #25772
  • dotnet workload update --print-download-link-only --sdk-version with 6.0.400 do not return results for previous sdk band #25774

PullRequests

Created

  • Exclude documentation changes from triggering builds #25842
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Switch NuGet assets for tests as tools to be under the test execution… #25837
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add support for specifying launch profile to `dotnet watch run` #25832
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [Proposal]: [Dot object deconstruction] #6197

Updated

  • [Proposal] Required Properties #3630

  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enabling EnforceCodeStyleInBuild disallow fade out unnecessary using #61703

Closed

  • Quick Info shows "Types:" section even when it's empty #61320
    Backlog
  • Convert to interpolated string adds (object) to everything #61346
    17.3
  • Intellisense not suggest "return" keyword when i am typing in Console Top Level statement #57121
    17.3
  • Locals introduced by `var` pattern are not properly colorized #61700
  • 'Go to all' can't find local functions #39083
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fixed empty types section shown in quick info #61702
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Suggest `return` keyword for regular top-level statements #61701
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61699
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #61698
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Include local-functions in the go-to index. #61568
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #61708
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #61707
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #61706
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Replace conditional with assignment #61697
    Area-IDE
  • Do not use `SourceText` indexer when parsing #61662
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove ISupportDirectMemoryAccess. #61693
    Area-IDE
  • Unwrap unexpected AggregateException for clarity #61684
    Area-Compilers
  • Classify pattern variables #59735
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61579
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove some outdated configurations in tools #52800
    Area-Compilers, Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Use fast in-proc heuristic to implement HasChangesAsync #61690
    Interactive-EnC, 17.3
  • Ref fields escape analysis #61195
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Throw a better exception when the HttpContext is accessed concurrently and will result in a null ref #42040
  • Perf regression: plaintext #42038
  • IRequestCookieCollection.TryGetValue() causes "Possible null reference" even if if-statement and return is used #42032

Closed

  • Perf improvement: caching #42035
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef, mapaction #42036

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the cookies authentication handler to always honor AuthenticationProperties.RedirectUri #42039
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Sync shared code from runtime #42037
    area-runtime
  • Fix IRequestCookieCollection.TryGetValue() possible null reference #42033
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Define `$(HelixTestConfigurationFilePath)` #42031
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Fix flakyServerReset_AfterEndStream_NoError test #42030

Merged

  • Define `$(HelixTestConfigurationFilePath)` #42029
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • Implemented minimal WebTransport Middleware #41945
    area-runtime
  • Did the first task of issue #42016: removing the default address (https://localhost:5001) for https #42021
    area-runtime
  • Remove explicit parameterName #42026
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add support for logging additional request headers #41753
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • (Corrected) Generate Full Composite Images of .NET and ASP.NET Bundled Together #41855
    area-infrastructure
  • Change project templates to have separate "http" and "https" launch profiles #42027
    area-mvc
  • Update TFM for reference assemblies in analyzer tests #42023
    area-infrastructure, analyzer, area-web-frameworks

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-06-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Implement StaggeredLayout #7761
  • Scrolling a CollectionView with SwipeView items causes exception on Windows #7757
  • FlexLayout RowReverse doesn't work Properly #7756
  • Objective-Sharpie not working anymore, needs .NET 6 update. #7755
  • No notification when custom properties change in compatibility renderer #7754
  • SignalR Client with MessagePack Protocol fails on MAUI iOS. #7753
  • Grid children default ZIndex is wrong #7752
  • On Windows (WinUI) Minimize, Normal, Maximize buttons behave strangely #7751
  • Android Emulator would not start #7750
  • CarouselView does not work on Windows (snapping and selection) #7749
    6.0-sr2
  • CollectionView does not update when changing ItemsLayout #7747
    6.0-sr2
  • Tab key behaves differently if Entry or Editor is last interactable control on a page on Windows #7746

Closed

  • How make friends projects MAUI blazor(Not library) and Blazor Client(WebAssembly)? #7743

PullRequests

Merged

  • More info on templates #7430
    area/templates 📄, 6.0-sr1

Updated

  • Add a default handler for TemplatedView #6447
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr2
  • Adding UWP-compatibility to ProgressBar #4653
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, .NET 7
  • Fix GridLayoutManager Layout calculation #7712
    area/layout 🔲
